LanguageData.AS_WHE_Scarf.label: Scarf (half elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Scarf.description: A scarf woven from cloth that provides protection against the cold while increasing neck protection. Although it has a simple design, the sight of it fluttering in the wind and moving gallantly may light a small fire in the hearts of those who see it.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShieldScarf.label: AS ShieldScarf
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShieldScarf.description: A scarf woven using cloth, hyperweave, with a shield function using half-elf technology. Very good protection around the neck.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ATShieldScarf.label: AS Hyper Shield Scarf
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ATShieldScarf.description: A shield scarf crafted with half-elf technology, modified with ancient technology. It is possible to prevent shooting from external enemies and shoot from the inside.
